sentences.en: He felt his head jerk reflexively.
sentences.cn: 他感到自己的头部突然反射性的抽动。

sentences.en: Putin's world view is reflexively anti-western.
sentences.cn: 普金有条件反射式的反西方的世界观。

sentences.en: If you reflexively say yes to taking on extra work, you may live to regret it.
sentences.cn: 如果你违反本能去选择更多的工作量的话，你一定会后悔。
